settings.prop_65_text:
California’s Proposition 65, also known as the Safe Drinking Water and Toxic Enforcement Act of 1986, was enacted to protect California citizens from and inform them about exposure to chemicals known to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm. Hapny Home has chosen to provide a warning that this product can potentially expose you to chemicals, such as lead.

For more information, go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.
